game

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Player()
      Default constructor setting player name to blank
      Player(java.lang.String playerName, boolean isComputer)
      Constructor including specific player name and computer information

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Gets player's name

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor setting player name to blank

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String playerName,
              boolean isComputer)
        Constructor including specific player name and computer information
        参数:
        playerName - the name of this player
        isComputer - indicate if current player is a computer
